meanings.definition: A type of sock that covers the lower leg and reaches up to the knee.
meanings.sent1: She wore pink kneesocks to keep her legs warm.
meanings.sent2: I bought a pair of kneesocks to match my skirt.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to play with the dangling kneesocks, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the room, bouncing off the kneesocks of memories.
meanings.sent5: The colorful kneesocks brightened up her outfit.

meanings.definition: Socks that are designed to be worn up to the knee.
meanings.sent1: During winter, she always wears kneesocks to stay cozy.
meanings.sent2: The school uniform required students to wear kneesocks.
meanings.sent3: He pretended the kneesocks were superhero capes and ran around the house.
meanings.sent4: The kneesocks of time seemed to stretch endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the kneesocks felt comforting against her skin.
